title: Blackstone's Gray says AI disruption risk is 'top of the page' for us
description: Disruption to businesses from artificial intelligence development is "top of the page" for Blackstone , the world's largest alternative asset manager, its president and chief operating officer Jon Gray said on Tuesday.
content:
"You want to be thinking about this in almost everything you're doing now," Gray told the WSJ Invest Live event in West Palm Beach, Florida.

description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Elon Musk’s SpaceX has taken over his artificial intelligence (AI) company xAI in a merger aimed at deploying space-based data centers, a statement said on Monday.
content:

title: OpenAI is unsatisfied with some Nvidia chips and looking for alternatives
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — OpenAI is unsatisfied with some of Nvidia’s latest artificial intelligence chips (AI), and it has sought alternatives since last year, eight sources familiar with the matter said, potentially complicating the relationship between the two highest-profile players in the AI boom.

title: SpaceX acquires xAI in record-setting deal valued at over $1T
description: SpaceX said it acquired artificial intelligence startup xAI in a blockbuster deal valued at more than $1 trillion, as Elon Musk pushes to scale AI infrastructure beyond Earth.
content:
Elon Musk’s SpaceX said Monday it is acquiring artificial-intelligence startup xAI, a move that significantly expands the rocket and satellite company’s ambitions in data centers and advanced computing.

title: Paris prosecutors raid X offices as part of investigation into child abuse images and deepfakes
description: X and Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI also face intensifying scrutiny from Britain's data privacy regulator, which opened formal investigations into how they handled personal data when they developed and deployed Musk's artificial intelligence chatbot Grok.

title: Inside Barnsley, the town hoping one big change will fix its potholes and A&E
description: The South Yorkshire town lost 30,000 jobs when the mining industry collapsed but can artificial intelligence help drive its renaissance?
content:
Fewer potholes, quicker access to a hospital bed, a job with Microsoft – these are just a few of the benefits the government hopes artificial intelligence (AI) will bring to the people of Barnsley after it was chosen as Britain’s first “tech town”.

content:
